pageTitle: I am the only one taking pictures of a friend's wedding: Nikon DX SLR (D40-D90, D3000-D7100) Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply to thread   Reply with quote   Adam I am a novice photographer by all means. If I do have one strength, it would be composition. Any advice would be appreciated! The expectations are not high since I am a friend and am not charging them, but I just want to be the best I can be! The 3000 has let me down before not capturing a moment when it should. I am hoping with a flash (even though it's modest) that the job will get done well. Is the D3000 enough to get the job done? The last thing I want is
